Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: Victor Miguel Saraiva Tomczak
Reviews.Content: Battery charge is effective and lasts same as original. Charger works good switched to a wall output or even switched to a car power intake.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 1 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 2100 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Fujifilm NP-85 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Halcyon 2100 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Fujifilm FinePix SL1000 Digital Camera and Fujifilm NP-85
